title: From Mao to Mozart: Isaac Stern in China
creator_credit: Murray Lerner and Harmony Film Group
brief_description: Isaac Stern and his family visited China for three weeks in 1989 as the guests of the Foreign Minister. Stern visits schools and conservatories of music, giving master classes and concerts, and speaking to music teachers who lived through the Cultural revolution.
